snippet.title: ارتفاع الهوية العرقية في ميانمار -Rising ethnic identity in Myanmar
snippet.description:
ارتفاع الهوية العرقية في ميانمار -Rising ethnic identity in Myanmar
Toegevoegd door ANA TV laatste maart
For the first time in 30 years, Myanmar government will conduct a nationwide population and housing census this month. In the past, many people from ethnic minority groups were forced to identify as Burmese for better life opportunities. But now ethnic leaders are pushing for their identities to be written on ID cards. Banyol Kong Janoi has more from Yangon.
215 views

snippet.title: Myanmar holds peace talks with ethnic groups
snippet.description:
Myanmar holds peace talks with ethnic groups
Toegevoegd door Al Jazeera English vorig jaar
Myanmar's reformist government has held peace talks with a federation of ethnic groups to try to resolve issues including the conflict in the northern state of Kachin.The United Nationalities Federal Council, which was formed by about a dozen ethnic groups including the Kachin, met Minister of the President's Office Aung Min and other officials in the northern Thai city of Chiang Mai. But as Al Jazeera's Wayne Hay reports, hopes are not high for a breakthrough.
171 views

snippet.title: HRW accuses Myanmar of 'ethnic cleansing'
snippet.description:
HRW accuses Myanmar of 'ethnic cleansing'
Toegevoegd door Agence France-Presse (AFP) vorig jaar
Myanmar has waged a campaign of "ethnic cleansing" against Rohingya Muslims, says Human Rights Watch. Duration: 01:28.
100 views

snippet.description:
تعداد ميانمار يشعل التوترات العرقية-Myanmar census stokes ethnic tensions
Toegevoegd door ANA TV 3 weken geleden
56 views

snippet.title: Myanmar Rohingya targeted in ethnic violence
snippet.description:
Myanmar Rohingya targeted in ethnic violence
Toegevoegd door Al Jazeera English vorig jaar
Human Rights Watch has released a report on the renewed ethnic violence in Myanmar's western Rakhine state. Clashes in June killed at least 78 people and sparked a refugee crisis. The group says security forces also targeted the minority Rohingyas. Florence Looi reports.
118 views

snippet.title: Deadly ethnic violence erupts in Myanmar
snippet.description:
Deadly ethnic violence erupts in Myanmar
Toegevoegd door Euronews vorig jaar
Myanmar has declared martial law in four central towns following unrest between Buddhists and Muslims that has left at least 20 people dead.Agitated crowds of Buddhists were still roaming the streets and several neighbourhoods were still on fire or smouldering after hundreds of Muslims were forced to flee for their lives. Two camps now hold more than 2,000 displaced people....http://www.euronews.net/
440 views

snippet.title: Myanmar Rohingya targeted in ethnic violence
snippet.description:
Myanmar Rohingya targeted in ethnic violence
Toegevoegd door Al Jazeera English vorig jaar
Human Rights Watch has released a report on the renewed ethnic violence in Myanmar's western Rakhine state. Clashes in June killed at least 78 people and sparked a refugee crisis. The group says security forces also targeted the minority Rohingyas. Florence Looi reports.

snippet.title: Deadly ethnic unrest spreads in Myanmar
snippet.description:
Deadly ethnic unrest spreads in Myanmar
Toegevoegd door CNN International vorig jaar
The U.S. is warning its citizens in Myanmar amid deadly ethnic unrest. Fionnuala Sweeney explains what's behind it all.
80 views

snippet.title: Myanmar refugees: Ethnic violence displaces thousands
snippet.description:
Myanmar refugees: Ethnic violence displaces thousands
Toegevoegd door Al Jazeera English vorig jaar
Tens of thousands of people continue to live in refugee camps in Myanmar's Rakhine state. They were forced to flee the fighting between Rohingya Muslims and local Buddhists. Al Jazeera gained access to camps around Sittwe township, where 70,000 people have been made homeless. Al Jazeera's Florence Looi has this exclusive report.
333 views

snippet.title: Ceasefire talks with Myanmar ethnic rebels to begin
snippet.description:
Ceasefire talks with Myanmar ethnic rebels to begin
Toegevoegd door Aljazeera Channel laatste november
Ethnic rebels in Myanmar have agreed to start nationwide ceasefire talks with the government. Seventeen armed groups have been meeting for the past 4 days. But getting any truce to hold will not be easy. Al Jazeera's Nicole Johnston reports.
7 views
